dt: {bc}the action or process of {d_link|negotiating|negotiate} or being {d_link|negotiated|negotiate}

dt.t: {it}Negotiations{/it} between the two governments have failed to produce an agreement.

et: Middle English {it}negociacion{/it} "dealing with people," borrowed from Latin {it}negōtiātiōn-, negōtiātiō{/it} "business, trade," from {it}negōtiārī{/it} "to do business, trade, deal" + {it}-tiōn-, -tiō,{/it} suffix of action nouns {ma}{mat|negotiate|}{/ma}
shortdef: the action or process of negotiating or being negotiated —often used in plural
